error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Class Drupal\Tests\file_url\FunctionalJavascript\FileUrlWidgetTest extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead
Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to file_url.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
